settings.title: About Argania
settings.html:
Incredibly Healthy & Delicious Moroccan Almond Butters made with Culinary Argan Oil. Beauty Starts from the inside ðŸ’«âœ¨.

Rancho Palos Verdes , CA 90275
Phone: (714) 862-8147

settings.title: Filter by color
settings.shop_by_tags_color: Blue, White, Red, Black, Brown, yellow, green

settings.title: Filter by color
settings.shop_by_tags_color: Blue, White, Red, Black, Brown, yellow, green

settings.title: Why we use Argan Oil?
settings.richtext: The amazing health benefits of eating argan oil> This miracle oil is packed with goodness, including essential fatty acids and antioxidants (including vitamin E, polyphenols, linoleic acid, and sterols), making it a common addition to luxury skincare products, but those same ingredients make a culinary necessity. The only difference between the argan oil you put on your face and culinary argan oil is that the argan oil you eat is made with roasted kernels to bring out its glorious nutty flavor.

settings.title: What is Argan Oil?
settings.richtext: The New York Times calls it “liquid gold” and beauty & lifestyle bloggers rave about its numerous nutritional and skincare benefits. The people of Morocco have been enjoying its nutritional, healing, and skin-loving powers for centuries!

settings.author: Sofia O.
settings.quote: This Maple Argania Butter is pretty freaking incredible! It's healthy enough to add to meals, but honestly I ate it straight from the jar as dessert most nights! It has just the right amount of sweetness.

settings.author: Yass S.
settings.quote: I ordered the coconut and Honey flavor. Hands down this is the most delicious Almond Butter i ever had! The extra nuttiness flavor from the Argan made it so tasty! This is my new go to Almond Butter brand!

settings.title: [social-instagram]FOLLOW @arganiabutter
settings.subtext: Posuere eget ut sed consectetur litora lobortis cras
